steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5oua0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8b56g","text":"In the first step, I'll refer to an image of software by using embed code retrieved from Box.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5av9q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ck4pi","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"700o6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"embed","mutability":"","data":{"code":"\u003ciframe src=\"https://app.box.com/embed/s/fxt1jdziawyaloaynv5exqtbsi92v5hh?sortColumn=date\u0026view=list\" width=\"500\" height=\"400\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen webkitallowfullscreen msallowfullscreen\u003e\u003c/iframe\u003e","guid":"5AF00C206FF311EC9BD8015760C41258"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4ko5l","text":"In this step, I'll use the Command component to tell the user to run a command.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqh9h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5uj8b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"am691","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b95lj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"command","mutability":"","data":{"id":9697,"name":"scp -rp username@login.projectName.uniName.edu:/spectrometername/username/directorypath/filename","os_name":null,"os_version":null,"command_name":"Copy spec data","description":"Code to copy data from a spectrometer.","can_edit":1,"guid":"A91033306FF311EC9BD8015760C41258"}}}}
